attributes.action: Install traffic calming measures in Armitage and Handsy
attributes.additional_details: Continued excessive speed along with regular RTAs , this will result in a fatality within the community, all the mentioned highways have regular pedestrians walking children to schools
attributes.background: Install either traffic calming chicanes/ speed bumps or speed cameras on the 3 village main roads and along the main village road (new road Armitage

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
